about_the_game:
It’s not stalking is research!

Board into the “Mayhempalooza III” the interstellar Earthling research Spaceship, gather your Friends, share youtube, facebook or twitch videos and let the mayhem begins!

Inside this very early alpha, we want to test some of the main core points of our game, that are: streaming and social gathering.

Inside Mayhem Space Cinema you can share YouTube, Facebook or Twitch videos, but remember what you share is your responsibility.

Also you will have voice chat, throwable objects, different skin colors and bunch more stuff coming on our updates.

Coming soon:
  • Room customization
  • Arcade games / mini games
  • Skins
  • Videos library
  • Cinema / Play modes

Let us know what you can do inside our spaceship, bring chaos, gather and research those funny earthlings videos!

name: Mayhem Space Cinema

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600k
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 657
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Procesador Intel® Core™ i7-6970HQ/AMD Equivalent
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 / Radeon HD 7510
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
